ing: 2 tablespoons YoplaitÂ® Greek 100 Blackberry Pie Yogurt
des: "For a quick breakfast or after-school snack, whole grain toast with blackberry yogurt, fresh blackberries and a dusting of cinnamon sugar is perfect."
ins: Toast bread and spread with the yogurt. Top with blackberries and a sprinkle of cinnamon sugar. Cut into 1-inch wide fingers and serve.
